website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a classic ball shape and low- to mid-level vibration intensity. Available at a decent price point.
pros: Has an LED indicator light and choice of four vibration modes
Rubberized coating is reasonably soft and has a textured surface that makes it comfortable to use
gets decent battery life per charge
cons: Vibration isn't intense enough for some users, even on the highest setting

customer_reviews.title: Love better than my foam roller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vibrating, massage ball! I have used foam rollers for years and was recently introduced to this little gem. It works out sore muscles with its duo of vibration (with 4 different speeds) and raised treads. Its compact so perfect to take to the gym or even on a trip. It's about 4 inches across. What I like best about this ball is you can use it like you would a foam roller but you can also hold it where you need it most. Think inside of your legs. This comes with a charger so no batteries required. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lasher

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Pretty intense vibration settings. Easy to hold in the hand. Haven't tried it for backs or thighs yet. My mom had hand surgery and is using it to keep scar tissue from building up. She also uses it to loosen her muscles in her hand as part of her therapy. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Truther

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic back pain and neuropathy and this is awesome. I've taken it on sever trips already. Holds its charge really well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa T

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pain issues and am very active. This massage ball is life changing. It relieves pain before and after activities, is small enough to carry with me, and very easy to use. The only downside: TSA doesn't seem to like it much.
customer_reviews.author: YGinNYC

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good ball but the vibration doesn’t really do a lot.
customer_reviews.author: shay

customer_reviews.title: Good product and right size
customer_reviews.text: the vibration is strong and size is right. if the power interface is standard USB it will be better.
customer_reviews.author: WYM

customer_reviews.title: Lousy battery life
customer_reviews.text: After having this for about 3 months and using it about once or twice a week. I notice it couldn’t hold its charge and was dead after a week if I didn’t use it. It was good when it was new. But $50 for 3months use? Look elsewhere. Or they need to source for a better lithium-ion battery instead of the cheap one that’s inside
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Teo

customer_reviews.title: Great when works but keeps turning off
customer_reviews.text: The button to turn on the device, keeps getting pressed as you roll on it. Bad design and frustrating having to keep toggling it ON. Otherwise great when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Zeesha a Sardar

customer_reviews.title: Four speeds
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little massager for derp muscle. I used this on a CP patient for excessive tone and he was able to relax the muscles in his hands and feet for a short time after each session.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this purchase will definitely be back with an update so far it's definitely doing what it's supposed to do. I had this annoying not in my neck and this little miracle of ball did its job.
customer_reviews.author: vip0278

customer_reviews.title: Very effective massager
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my neck, under my shirt/sweat shirt to apply some massage; it is very effective and relaxing. Has three levels, and an auto shut off. It also works great on the bottom of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: LompocTom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed using the massage ball. Definitely gets the job done in terms of providing an extra level of relief to sore muscles. My only complaint is that the power button is flush with the exterior of the ball so when you're rolling around you can hit the button easily and turn of the vibrating function. Overall I'd recommend purchasing if you're looking for a new massage ball.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and portable
customer_reviews.text: This was suggested by my trainer to help me with tight muscles around my leg and hip. It performed just as described for helping release tense muscles and having the various speeds gave me options when targeting specific areas. I also like its portability and that it's small enough to pack in your luggage without taking up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: ACH223

customer_reviews.title: Great therapeutic device
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with Lymphedema. This vibrating ball was great in relieving the swelling and reducing the scar tissue in my neck. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great massage ball
customer_reviews.text: This massage ball is great! It’s rechargable - no batteries to change. Charge lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Maura M

customer_reviews.title: A must in your gym bag
customer_reviews.text: A great massage ball to add to gym bag for when muscles start to spasm
customer_reviews.author: KAB

customer_reviews.title: Fully charged upon receipt?
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Am concerned item may have been previously used as was fully charged. Hummmmm!
customer_reviews.author: Char 37

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok I guess, but I like a hard massage.. the ball at equinox was way more powerful but I thought I could get this one cheaper.. should have spent the extra
customer_reviews.author: SHAUN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to stretching and relieving sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: The Sedona 4-Speed Vibrating Massage Ball helped to ease the tightness and soreness of my muscles. It is easy to use and has been a fantastic add to my foam roller! The different speeds/strengths are great for those days when I've don't too much at the gym. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ranoumallouk

customer_reviews.title: Save the money for a higher end company
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any vibration even at level 4 at least compared to other products I have used. The ball is to soft for any real pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Nelse

customer_reviews.title: disperses the pain!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this ball. I have used a tennis or golf ball for the past year to roll out my gluteus medius, which can be so painful. I love that the vibration of this pain disperses the pain so that its not so acute. My cousin and I are very active and we have loved using this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fifer

customer_reviews.title: Really great mobility tool
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, 4 settings, easy to use and take with you
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Vander Linden

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable product
customer_reviews.text: The product is well built. With study casing. 4 vibrations modes controlled by a single big power button
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product. Using for foot massage. Very good construction. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tedisco

customer_reviews.title: Great Massage Ball
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’ve been using it for a month and am really happy with the options and settings it has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes but it’s a flop
customer_reviews.text: Really wishing I liked this but I don’t. Just isn’t a sting enough vibration, awkward to use since it’s a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tennis injuries!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size easy fit in your hand. Buying more fire my tennis friends!
customer_reviews.author: natalie jennings

customer_reviews.title: This is a great purchase for sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product and it released pain in my upper and lower back. Definitely get if you need another way to relieve stress. It does vibrate your hand a lot though.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Reisch

customer_reviews.title: Relieves muscles
customer_reviews.text: The vibration of the ball really gets in there and works out the muscle tightness
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Burke

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Turns off while using because on/off button gets triggered while filling out!!! Total bummer
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great for tension relief
customer_reviews.text: This is a great handy little massager. I’m a runner and foam roll regularly to help with tightness, especially in my calves. The vibrating feature really helps. I also use this to relieve tension in my upper back. It’s easy to charge and is very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered black and received green accidentally and like the color. It’s very soothing and my back and neck feel better already. I didn’t need to use the highest setting which is intense. The lower ones are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Loves Cats

customer_reviews.title: My new Friend
customer_reviews.text: OH the PAIN this ball will cause.. and Also help relieve. I LOVE my massage ball and it was HALF the price of the ones advertised on Instagram and Facebook. I will use it on my back while sitting in my recliner and also my hip. My wife uses on her Hammies and her glutes. I like the medium and High ranges. initial charge and this thing has lasted almost 2 weeks using it for 30-40 mins nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Rpm is not matching even with my lower rated peanut electrical roller ...it is not effective
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Small Massage Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is not the $200 massage ball that you've read about, but it gets the job done. Portable, semi-strong massage. Good for post-workout muscle stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Cara L. Moccia

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Hard to stay balanced on it and the vibrations are not all that strong.
customer_reviews.author: ciara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! My husband puts it in his basketball bag and it fits perfectly and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Miriah Paup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, has 4 setting on it. Perfect gift for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Joy b.

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: We got this gift especially for my husband. He works very long hours as a contractor. He currently has back pain or muscle pain or strain even from the work that he does. This helps him relieve that pain. Not to mention the kids also like it we do it on their back.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Brown- Sweet Maple Living

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this massage ball! It's so easy to use even my 5 year old can use it! I love how it is rechargeable so no need to replace batteries! Definitely would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget graves

product_meta.title: Sedona, 4 Speed Vibrating Massage Ball, Rechargeable Textured Foam Roller, Muscle Tension Pain and Pressure Relieving Fitness Massaging Balls, Myofascial Release for Feet Arms Back and Neck, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackMuscle pain and tension can be painful and exhausting, especially if you are exercising and working out often. That is why we made our massage ball portable, so that the Sedona massage ball can bring relief to you, wherever you are. Our textured design, along with multiple options allows you to stretch and bring comfort to your muscles, so that you can live better. Features: -4 intensity levels: Low, Medium, High -Automatic vibration mode -Comes with a charger for portable charging -Works well to stretch hips, back, waist, arms, heels, and thighs -LED Light indicators -Long battery life -No batteries needed -Easy to clean -Portable -Relieves pain and tension
feature_bullets: Enhanced vibration - Our targeted treatment gives you four vibration settings to fit your needs. The vibrator includes low, medium, high, and pulsing speeds. Whether you are trying to relieve a small itch or long term muscle tension, the Sedona massage ball provides options for you
Durability - The rubber shelling technology, ensures that the massage ball is both gentle and durable, ensuring that you can relieve your pain without worry

Pain reduction - The Sedona Massage ball’s compact and advanced design gives you access to hard to reach pain points and provides both relief and relaxation. It works to massage and relieve your back, hips, legs, arms, waist, and feet

Textured surface - Our textured surface allows for a massage with more comfort to bring you relaxation and eliminate pain. The Sedona massage ball with relieve muscle tension and soreness that is holding you back
Satisfaction guaranteed - We stand behind our product and our customer service team is here for you and happy to help answer and questions you may have

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
